name: ts-f-api
description: Scaffolding for a Typescript poject for a frontend API server
author: Balaganesh Damodaran <asleepysamurai@gmail.com>

scripts.prep: rimraf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp tsconfig.json ./dist && cp -r config ./dist/ && mkdir -p src/codegen
scripts.run:standard: cd dist && env NODE_ENV=development node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.js
scripts.run:inspect: cd dist && env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.js
scripts.run:inspect-brk: cd dist && env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.js
scripts.run:prod: cd dist && env NODE_ENV=production node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.js
scripts.start: yarn prep && yarn env:types:dev && yarn build:run
scripts.start:inspect: yarn prep && yarn env:types:dev && yarn build:watch:run
scripts.start:inspect-brk: yarn prep && yarn env:types:dev && yarn build:watch:run-brk
scripts.start:prod: yarn prep && yarn env:types:prod && yarn build:prod
